      • integerSequence

        public static DataSeries<Integer> integerSequence(int length,
                                                  int start,
                                                  int step)
        Generates a DataSeries that contains a sequence of integer values that increase or decrease by the given step size.
        Parameters:
        length - The length of the series.
        start - The first value in the series.
        step - The step between values, may be positive or negative.

      • realSequence

        public static DataSeries<Double> realSequence(int length,
                                              double start,
                                              double step)
        Generates a DataSeries that contains a sequence of real (double) values that increase or decrease by the given step size.
        Parameters:
        length - The length of the series.
        start - The first value in the series.
        step - The step between values, may be positive or negative.

      • randomUniformSeries

        public static DataSeriesDouble randomUniformSeries(int length,
                                                   double min,
                                                   double max)
        Generates a DataSeries containing uniformly distributed numbers.
        Parameters:
        length - The length of the series.
        min - The minimum allowable value.
        max - The maximum allowable value.

      • randomNormalSeries

        public static DataSeriesDouble randomNormalSeries(int length,
                                                  double mean,
                                                  double stdDev)
        Generates a DataSeries containing normally (Gaussian) distributed numbers.
        Parameters:
        length - The length of the series.
        mean - The mean of the distribution.
        stdDev - The standard deviation of the distribution.

      • randomDateSeries

        public static AbstractDataSeries<Date> randomDateSeries(int length,
                                                        Date min,
                                                        Date max)
        Generates a DataSeries containing uniformly distributed dates.
        Parameters:
        length - The length of the series.
        min - The minimum allowable date.
        max - The maximum allowable date.

      • makeRandomTable

        public static DataTable makeRandomTable(int length)
        Generates a table containing DataSeries as such: "real [0, 1]", "real normal", "integer [0, 100]", "date time [1970, now]".
        Parameters:
        length - The length of each DataSeries.

      • mtCars

        public static DataTable mtCars()
        Returns a table containing the "mt cars" dataset. The data was extracted from the 1974 Motor Trend US magazine, and comprises fuel consumption and 10 aspects of automobile design and performance for 32 automobiles (1973â€“74 models).
